statements: SELECT * FROM local_water_regulations;
SELECT regulation_name, compliance_status FROM local_water_regulations;
SELECT * FROM local_water_regulations ORDER BY regulation_id DESC;
SELECT regulation_name FROM local_water_regulations WHERE compliance_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM local_water_regulations WHERE inspection_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT regulation_name, compliance_status FROM local_water_regulations WHERE regulation_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM local_water_regulations WHERE compliance_status = TRUE ORDER BY inspection_date DESC;
SELECT regulation_name, inspection_date FROM local_water_regulations WHERE compliance_status = FALSE AND inspection_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT regulation_id, regulation_name, compliance_status FROM local_water_regulations WHERE compliance_status = TRUE ORDER BY regulation_name ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_regulations FROM local_water_regulations;
SELECT * FROM WaterRegulations;
SELECT regulation_name, regulation_date FROM WaterRegulations ORDER BY regulation_date DESC;
SELECT regulation_name, regulation_description FROM WaterRegulations WHERE regulation_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM ComplianceRecords WHERE compliance_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM ComplianceRecords JOIN WaterRegulations ON ComplianceRecords.regulation_id = WaterRegulations.regulation_id;
SELECT * FROM WaterRegulations WHERE regulation_id = 1;
SELECT regulation_name, regulation_description FROM WaterRegulations WHERE regulation_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ComplianceRecords WHERE compliance_status = TRUE;
SELECT regulation_id, record_date, compliance_status FROM ComplianceRecords ORDER BY record_date DESC;
SELECT regulation_id, regulation_name, compliance_status FROM WaterRegulations JOIN ComplianceRecords ON WaterRegulations.regulation_id = ComplianceRecords.regulation_id;
SELECT * FROM water_regulations;
SELECT regulation_name, regulatory_body, compliance_status FROM water_regulations WHERE regulation_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM inspection_records ORDER BY inspection_date DESC;
SELECT violation_id, violation_description, fine_amount FROM violation_records WHERE violation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT inspection_id, inspector_name FROM inspection_records ORDER BY inspection_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM water_regulations;
SELECT regulation_name, regulatory_body FROM water_regulations WHERE compliance_status = TRUE;
SELECT inspection_date, inspector_name FROM inspection_records ORDER BY inspection_date DESC;
SELECT violation_description, fine_amount FROM violation_records WHERE fine_amount > 1000;

SELECT regulation_name, enforcement_date, violation_description FROM water_regulations JOIN inspection_records ON water_regulations.regulation_id = inspection_records.regulation_id JOIN violation_records ON inspection_records.inspection_id = violation_records.inspection_id WHERE regulatory_body = 'EPA';
SELECT * FROM Water_Regulations;
SELECT regulation_name, jurisdiction FROM Water_Regulations WHERE compliance_status = TRUE;
SELECT organization_name, location FROM Organizations ORDER BY organization_name DESC;
SELECT contact_name, email, phone_number FROM Contacts WHERE organization_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM Compliance_Records WHERE compliance_level = 'High' ORDER BY record_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Water_Regulations WHERE compliance_status = TRUE;
SELECT regulation_name, jurisdiction FROM Water_Regulations WHERE regulation_name LIKE '%water%';
SELECT organization_name, location FROM Organizations WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT contact_name, email, phone_number FROM Contacts WHERE organization_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Compliance_Records WHERE compliance_level = 'High' ORDER BY record_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM regulations;
SELECT name, type FROM regulations WHERE type='Environmental';
SELECT id, description FROM regulations WHERE name LIKE '%Safety%';
SELECT * FROM compliance_records ORDER BY status DESC;
SELECT violation_description, severity FROM violation_reports WHERE severity='High' ORDER BY report_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM regulations ORDER BY name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT description, name FROM regulations WHERE type = 'Environmental' AND created_at > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY created_at ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT violation_description, severity, report_date FROM violation_reports WHERE severity = 'High' ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT agency_name, contact_person FROM regulatory_agencies WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY agency_name;
SELECT inspector_name, inspection_date, result FROM inspection_records WHERE inspection_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY inspection_date DESC LIMIT 5;
